entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Otterburn Park
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Hubert Airport 12:55 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.6°C

Visibility: 6.4 km

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Freezing rain near the river early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
